dove.util.struct.tree

Class Tree.TreeGlobalVarHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • dove.util.treelib.Tree.TreeGlobalVarHelper
  • Enclosing class:
    Tree<T> 

    protected static class Tree.TreeGlobalVarHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    controlls all objects that are used globally in this tree

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Tree.InternalIDHelper idHelper
      the internal ID Helper of this object
      private boolean threadSafe
      true, if this tree is made threadsafe by the treescheduler by default, threadsafety is disabled for all trees, due to its resource consumption
      private Tree.TreeScheduler treeScheduler
      the treescheduler that handles all reading and writing operations of this tree

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      TreeGlobalVarHelper()
      creates a new Tree Helper and enables all

        private boolean threadSafe
        true, if this tree is made threadsafe by the treescheduler by default, threadsafety is disabled for all trees, due to its resource consumption

    • Method Detail

      • getTreeScheduler

        public Tree.TreeScheduler getTreeScheduler()
        Returns:
        the treescheduler currently controlling all operations on this tree, or null, if threadsafety is disabled

        Returns:
        the internalIDHelper of this tree

      • enableThreadSafety

        public void enableThreadSafety()
        makes this tree threadsafe and starts a new TreeScheduler-instance for this tree

      • disableThreadSafety

        disables threadsafty for this tree quits the treescheduler

        Returns:
